quote_first: Adam licked his fingers and rubbed them over his eyes as he tried to get accustomed to the dark. He checked the little luminous dial on his alarm clock:
title: A Matter of Honor
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: in the morning when Pastor Grant finally got back to the parsonage.
title: Warrior Monk
author: Ray Keating

title: The Whole Story and Other Stories
author: Ali Smith
